.method public static hidebysig class System.Windows.TextDecorationCollection ConvertFromString(string text) cil managed

Docs.param: The to be converted into the object.
Docs.summary: Attempts to convert a specified string to an instance of .
Docs.returns: The instance of created from the converted .

remarks.format:
## Remarks The string value of the `text` parameter can either be "None", or a combination of the predefined <xref:System.Windows.TextDecoration> names delimited by commas, such as "Underline, Strikethrough". The names are case-insensitive values.
One or more blanks spaces can precede or follow each text decoration name or comma. In addition, duplicate text decoration names are not allowed.
